entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of light snow early this morning. Fog dissipating late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023
